resources.string: Glaze warning is displayed only if temperature has been above 0.5 \u2103 and has fallen below or is equal to 0.5 \u2103. \n\nNotification sound is not played if your phone is on silent.
How do I reconfigure the widget ?
Simply touch the right edge of the widget (both 2x1 and 4x1) to open configuration.
I found a bug, what to do?
So, have you found a bug. Don\'t post a negative comment on the market, help the developer and send him an email. Describe what you have found and how to reproduce it.
If any field on the widget is displayed with \u221E (infinity) symbol, then it means that EMHI does not provide data for the field.
